mapper.select: select sr.artist_no, sr.artist_name from search_recommend sr where sr.status = 'A' order by sr.sort asc limit 6;

select a.id, a.artist_no, a.country_code, a.name, a.birth, a.death, a.education, a.exhibition, a.profile, a.homepage, a.sns_account, a.media, a.articles, a.is_open from artist a where a.is_open = 'Y' and a.status = 'A' and a.artist_no = #{artist_no};
